changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table goplay.user ( user_id int auto_increment primary key, user_name char(20) not null, user_surname char(20) not null, user_nickname char(20) not null, sex char(10) not null, country char(200) not null, city char(200) not null, age int not null, social char(30), about_me tinytext );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table goplay.event ( event_id int auto_increment primary key, event_type_id int(11), creator_id int(11), event_date char(20) not null, event_time_start char(20) not null, event_time_finish char(20) not null, country char(20) not null, city char(20) not null, place_name char(30) not null, number_people_fact int not null, number_people_max int not null, sex_type char(10) not null, age_min int not null, age_max int not null, level_game char(10), event_comment tinytext, CONSTRAINT event_event_type_id foreign key (event_type_id) references event_type (type_id), CONSTRAINT event_user_id foreign key (creator_id) references user (user_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table goplay.user_event_type ( user_id int not null, type_id int not null, primary key (user_id, type_id), CONSTRAINT user_event_type_user_id_fk foreign key (user_id) references user (user_id), CONSTRAINT user_event_type_event_type_id_fk foreign key (type_id) references event_type (type_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table goplay.event_user ( event_id int not null, user_id int not null, primary key (event_id, user_id), CONSTRAINT event_user_event_id_fk foreign key (event_id) references event (event_id), CONSTRAINT event_user_user_id_fk foreign key (user_id) references user (user_id) );
